games.title: Super Mario 3D All-Stars
games.description: Join Mario on a grand adventure through various 3D worlds in this collection of classic titles.

games.title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: Explore the futuristic city of Night City as V, a mercenary searching for an immortality chip.

games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
games.description: Embark on a new quest as Link in the latest installment of the iconic Legend of Zelda series.

games.title: Street Fighter 6
games.description: Fight against formidable opponents in intense one-on-one battles in the latest installment of the iconic fighting series.

games.title: Elden Ring
games.description: Uncover the mysteries of the shattered world of the Elden Ring in this open-world action RPG.

games.title: NBA 2K24
games.description: Experience the excitement of professional basketball in the latest installment of the NBA 2K series.

games.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
games.description: Step into the vast and open world of Skyrim, where dragons roam and adventures await around every corner.

games.title: Baldur's Gate 3
games.description: Embark on an epic journey in the world of Dungeons & Dragons, filled with magic, monsters, and intrigue.

games.title: Starfield
games.description: Venture into the uncharted depths of space in Bethesda's upcoming sci-fi epic, Starfield.

games.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: Follow Geralt of Rivia on his quest to find Ciri in this critically acclaimed open-world RPG.

games.title: Horizon Forbidden West
games.description: Return to Aloy's world in this sequel to Horizon Zero Dawn, where new mysteries and dangers await.

games.title: God of War: Ragnarok
games.description: Join Kratos and Atreus on a new adventure in Norse mythology as they face powerful foes and uncover hidden truths.

games.title: Final Fantasy XVI
games.description: Immerse yourself in the next installment of the beloved Final Fantasy series, featuring an epic tale of magic and conflict.
